Prospectus January 10, 2022 SPDR ®Series Trust
SPDR S&P SmallCap 600 ESG ETF (ESIX) Principal
U.S. Listing Exchange: NYSE Arca, Inc. The
U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has
not approved or disapproved these securities
or passed upon the accuracy or adequacy of
this Prospectus. Any representation to the
contrary is a criminal offense. Shares in the
Fund are not guaranteed or insured by the
Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation or any
other agency of the U.S. Government, nor are
shares deposits or obligations of any bank. It
is possible to lose money by investing in the
Fund.
